summary: A comic drama set on a Mediterranean island, where a motley collection of characters is seeking musical redemption.
cast: Stanley Tucci|Rhys Ifans|Hugh Bonneville|Jena Malone|Jessica Hynes|Karl Johnson|Virgile Bramly|María Esteve|Marisa Paredes|Emmanuelle Seigner|Manuel Barceló|Amy Baillarceon|Tolo Servera|Drew Donovan|Illona Novacrova|Ivan de Lucas|Roumiana Tzankova Nounez|Mario Kugehl|Miriam Delorge|Salvador Oliva Suau|Marcus Kuhne|Pere Pau Martin Antich|Scott Kenny|Kay Petchold|Toni de Cùber
title: Mallorca's Song
